title: Baldur's Gate 3
description: Baldur's Gate 3 is a 2023 role-playing video game developed and published by Larian Studios.

title: Elden Ring
description: Elden Ring is a 2022 action role-playing video game developed and published by FromSoftware.

title: It Takes Two
description: It Takes Two is a 2021 cooperative action-adventure video game developed by Hazelight Studios.

title: The Last of Us Part II
description: The Last of Us Part II is a 2020 action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog.

title: Sekiro
description: Sekiro: Shadows Die Twice is a 2019 action-adventure game developed by FromSoftware.

title: God of War (2018)
description: God of War is an action-adventure game developed by Santa Monica Studio and published by Sony.

title: The Legend of Zelda
description: Breath of the Wild is a 2017 action-adventure game developed and published by Nintendo.

title: Overwatch
description: Overwatch was a 2016 team-based multiplayer first-person shooter game by Blizzard Entertainment.

title: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
description: The Witcher 3 is a 2015 action role-playing game developed and published by CD Projekt.

title: Dragon Age: Inquisition
description: Inquisition is a 2014 role-playing game developed by BioWare and published by Electronic Arts.

title: Grand Theft Auto V
description: Grand Theft Auto V is a 2013 action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games.

title: The Walking Dead
description: The Walking Dead is an episodic adventure video game developed and published by Telltale Games.

title: The Elder Scrolls V
description: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim is a 2011 action role-playing game developed by Bethesda Studios

title: Red Dead Redemption
description: Red Dead Redemption is a 2010 action-adventure game developed and published by Rockstar Games

title: Uncharted 2
description: Uncharted 2: Among Thieves is a 2009 action-adventure game developed by Naughty Dog .

title: Metal Gear Solid 4
description: Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots is a 2008 action-adventure video game developed  by Konami

title: BioShock
description: BioShock is a 2007 first-person shooter game developed by 2K Boston and published by 2K.

title: Gears of War
description: Gears of War is a 2006 third-person shooter video game developed by Epic Games.

title: Resident Evil 4
description: Resident Evil 4 is a horror game by Capcom, originally released for the GameCube in 2005.

title: Half Life II
description: Half-Life 2 is a 2004 first-person shooter (FPS) game developed and published by Valve Corporation.
